name: XPLORE (EBENOB7)
description:
XPLORE is a challenging but simple and interesting 2D Platformer game. Explore the environment, Overcome obstacles and find your way home.

MODIFICATIONS.

1. Improved visuals

2. sound

3. Three levels

4. Challenging gameplay.

Credits: 

Eben O.B Baidoo.

Michigan State University.
